channel.title: The day when the help threads are finally cleaned
channel.description:
When will this come, or will it come?
No one searches the help sections, because there are so many keywords people have used for the last 4 years, its nearly impossible to find an answer.
Most of the questions have been answer numerous times, but thats why you just make a sticky for numerously asked questions.
Whats your opinion on this? Want, don't want.
No flame or spam, or you will be infracted.

item.title: The day when the help threads are finally cleaned
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

People that do use the search feature use previous threads to answer help threads. I’ve used my previous threads and others to answer plenty of recent threads.

Read full topic
item.source: The day when the help threads are finally cleaned

item.title: The day when the help threads are finally cleaned
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Rixxx:

Never going to happen so stop ranting; there have been many similar threads.

Where was i ranting at?

Si Force:

People need to learn how to use the search feature properly, then they should have no problem at all with finding their answer. It’s all there, you just need to word it right.

There is 4 years of help threads, it won’t matter if you word it right, you will find topics with no answers, or topics just suggesting it.

Don’t look at this perspective from your point of view, look at it from an RSPS beginner.

Read full topic
item.source: The day when the help threads are finally cleaned
